item.description:
Hey guys and gals! Several members have expressed an interest in going out to belch out a couple songs or crack on those with the guts to get up there. Either way, usually fun for all!

 

Betty's Pub & Chinese Restaurant just opened up several months ago in Cranston. I've eaten there and the food is good. Betty also makes the best Polynesian drinks around, and the prices are very reasonable.

 

Many businesses in RI are struggling to stay afloat and a newly opened restaurant is no exception, so please come out and have some good food and drinks, meet or make new friends, and become rock stars

 

Mics go live at 8pm, but I'll be there at 7 for grub and possible a scorpion bowl??? hmmm... The DJ is also a musician who will play the acoustic guitar and sing upon request.
item.how_to_find_us: You will not miss me, it's not a big place nor overly crowded
item.name: Karaoke @ Betty's Pub In Cranston
